cwd.description: Current working directory of the child process.

shell.description: <boolean> | <string> If true, runs command inside of a shell. Uses '/bin/sh' on Unix, and process.env.ComSpec on Windows. A different shell can be specified as a string. See Shell requirements and Default Windows shell. Default: true.

windowsHide.description: Hide the subprocess console window that would normally be created on Windows systems.
